name: PH_2_5_9_Manage_Personal_Genetic_Information
title: PH.2.5.9 Manage Personal Genetic Information (Function)
description: Manage the Account Holderâ€™s genetic information.
purpose: Limited personal genetic information is becoming available and it is anticipated that a much richer actionable data set will derive from current research. This function serves as a placeholder to take advantage of the scientific breakthroughs as they become available.

statement.label: PH.2.5.9#01
statement.requirement: The system MAY manage results of specific genetic tests, genetic markers, or findings according to user preference and/or consent, user role, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: PH.2.5.9#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture and present known genetically-based illnesses according to user preference and/or consent, user role, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: PH.2.5.9#03
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture and present a known single allele carrier status of a recessive genetic trait or diseases according to user preference and/or consent, user role, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
